title: Negative Lp from dodging queues with idiots
body: Am I in greater danger of being demoted if I have a negative Lp count?

replies.body:
Hey Hairy Lobster,

No, you aren't in as much of a danger if you have a negative LP count. Demotions are mostly based off of MMR, so as long as your MMR is within the range for your tier, you should be just fine.
